metadata.title: CVE-2021-46991 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i40e: Fix use-after-free in i40e_client_subtask()Currently the call to i40e_client_del_instance frees the objectpf->cinst, however pf->cinst->lan_info is being accessed afterthe free. Fix this by adding the missing return.Addresses-Coverity: ("Read from pointer after free")

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
